item.description:
This restaurant has consistently received high reviews. The food combinations are very creative and beautiful. They also have some nice vegetarian offerings. If you want to go with something familiar, they offer some favorites too (see lower portion of menu). Very different, and very good. See the full menu here.

Wuxi Short Ribs with Baby bok choy and flat rice noodles
Pan-roasted pork tenderloin with local farm honey and Asian greens and shallot fried rice
Peking Duck with Steamed Chinese burger buns with scallions and Beijing tianmenjing spread
Gulf shrimp and sea scallops with garlic chives and X.O sauce
Silk Route Lamb Shank with Bliss potatoes, carrots, ginger, cumin and bay leaf
Black Angus N.Y strip with Sichuan with peppercorn dusting, soy and brown butter glazed
Wok-seared flank steak with jalapeno peppers and onions
Crispy shrimp with melon and fruit glaze
Crispy sea scallops with Sichuan hot Mala sauce
Amoy Grilled Salmon - Herb and chili flake rubbed, served with shallot fried rice

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Forbidden City Asian Fusion
